alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:59PM AKST until January 29 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING ALONG KACHEMAK BAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Blowing snow will result in significantly reduced visibility. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Homer and Seldovia. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
